alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 29 at 2:24PM MDT until March 31 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 20 inches above 7000 feet MSL and 6 to 12 inches below 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Bear River Range including but not limited to Emigration Summit. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.
